name: SVSV
description:
https://discord.gg/nUCTqnKxRt




As you embark on this epic adventure, your mission is twofold: survive relentless waves of invaders and uncover the enigma behind their relentless onslaught. To aid you on this perilous journey, you'll collect a formidable arsenal of weaponry, unearth powerful relics, and skillfully harness potent power-ups. These resources will fortify your character, enhancing your capabilities and empowering you to face the challenges that lie ahead.
